SEARCH
Package com.game.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.game.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the core logic and state of the game. Manages players, deck, turn order, penalties, and game flow.
Since:
1.8
See Also:

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Card selectedCard)
      Used by human player exclusively. Checks if the input card is playablel. If yes, udpate game state and removes the card from their hand. if not, prompts them to draw a new card.
      Parameters:
      selectedCard -

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn()
      Manages game loop. Handles player's move and update the game state.

      Parameters:
      player - - a player who needs to draw a new card
